attributes.action: End Covid Lockdown Restrictions Immediately To Protect Our Damaged Eonomy
attributes.additional_details: From the years 2012-2019, there have been countless headlines about hospitals being overwhelmed with influenza "flu" cases, yet there was never any national shutdown. We want the Government to take action and open up all businesses to save the lives of business owners who are on the brink of homelessness. If this is to protect our health, what about them?
attributes.background: Our nation has been in a state of almost constant lockdown since March of 2020. Millions of small businesses such as restaurants, beauty salons and hotels have been forced to shut for months at a time, leading to bankruptcy. Open up our nation.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Repeal Coronavirus Act and end all Covid-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561995

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469

Fund & provide services to allow the vulnerable to shield & re-open the economy
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023
